item.title: Tiny AI ERP startup Campfire is winning so many startups from NetSuite, Accel led a $35M Series A
item.description: Campfire was launched in 2023 to upend 1990s-era enterprise resource planning accounting software (ERP) like Netsuite with an LLM-powered alternative.
